commands.name: playPause
commands.title: Toggle Play/Pause
commands.subtitle: Tidal
commands.description: Toggles play or pause of current track in Tidal.

commands.name: previousTrack
commands.title: Previous Track
commands.subtitle: Tidal
commands.description: Skips to the previous track in Tidal.

commands.name: nextTrack
commands.title: Next Track
commands.subtitle: Tidal
commands.description: Skips to the next track in Tidal.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
